title: Best of the Program | Guests: Jason Whitlock & Ken Paxton | 5/25/22
description:
A horrific attack happened in Uvalde, Texas, and Democrats were quick to make it political. But Glenn discusses the root of the issue and relates the problem to everything else going wrong in America. BlazeTV host Jason Whitlock talks with Glenn about the Uvalde tragedy and the God-shaped hole in America. Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton gives insight on the Uvalde attack.

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
